typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		a as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> inputSource
inputSource derive(a = ((toInteger(a) + 10 -1 ) *10) / 5) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ex_id__c as string,
		Name as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['calculation_100.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> outputResult
